text:
So HubSpot just changed the way I do new landing pages this morning and it will no longer find templates I've built even though they are still in files. I also clicked into other files at the bottom of the page and toggled through to where those templates would be alphabetically and it's not showing them.
Anyone know what gives?
Hi Daniel, Can you DM me your portal ID and I’ll revert you to the old version. Thanks.
Does  anyone know how to add a “delete all my data” option to an email subscription preference page?

Thank you <@U01MZHL7JDS> or highlighting this! I'm facing the same issue where I can't access a lot of templates with this new version either.

<@ULCSUPTGU> can I DM you my portal ID so you can revert mine to the old version as well? :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi everyone. When i insert a custom token like contact.email in a link, it shows up like this: <https://impu.pe/test?email=marcelo.daros%40impu>
is there a way to print that %40 as @ ?
the idea is sending emails with different urls containing that parameter. any help..would be awesome lml
